mapper.select: select * from products p join stock s on p.pd_id=s.pd_id order by p.pd_id desc;
select pd_id, pd_name, pd_img, pd_color from products where pd_name=#{0};
select pd_id from products where pd_name=#{param1} and pd_color=#{param2};
mapper.insert: insert into products (pd_name, pd_price, pd_color, pd_desc, cat_id, discount, pd_img) values (#{pd_name}, #{pd_price}, #{pd_color}, #{pd_desc}, #{cat_id}, #{discount}, #{pd_img});
mapper.update: update products set pd_model=#{pd_model}, pd_name=#{pd_name}, pd_price=#{pd_price}, pd_size=#{pd_size}, pd_color=#{pd_color}, pd_desc=#{pd_desc}, cat_id=#{cat_id}, discount=#{discount}, pd_img=#{pd_img}, pd_stock=#{pd_stock} where pd_id=#{pd_id};
